name: Broccoli Brawl
description:
Have you thought about what would happen, if you put a bunch of broccoli in an arena and forced them to fight each other. The produce will grow by remaining in the sunlight, others will shrink if they wander off into the dark. Do you have what it takes to rise to the status of broccendary?
If so it’s time to Broc ‘n’ roll!

A game made during Happy Volcano’s winter game jam 2022.

Tom Rigolle - Project Lead & Game Programmer
Silke Nemegeer - Game Programmer
Dmitry Derybas - Game Programmer
Thomas Charier - Game Artist
Quality Assurance & in-charge of sound - Simon Jakobsson
Voice acting done by Simon & Tom

Music obtained from https://incompetech.com/
Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
